__comment: Looking for a way to get this exported into other formats?
title: Changelog

releases.title: After drag update
added: AfterDrag, allowing you to optionally fine tune your captured area
Responsive save buttons
Config Window now notifies you in multiple situations if you have unsaved changes
Fancy flag icons
Custom title setting for each profile
Wiki system, starting with some of the info buttons
changed: Better Icon Window (Tabs, drag & drop)
'Open image folder' now opens last folder you screenshotted in
Fixed issue with CTRL + V not working in editor
Fixed bug with Capture Window getting stuck if message popup is open

releases.title: The update update!
added: Update button
Profile icons to dropdown in config window
changed: You can now have as many custom icons in your icon chooser as you want

releases.title: This release has been removed due to a critical bug, please use [3.9.2](https://github.com/CaptureCoop/SnipSniper/releases/tag/3.9.2)
This release has been removed due to a critical bug, please use [3.9.2](https://github.com/CaptureCoop/SnipSniper/releases/tag/3.9.2)

added: Eraser stamp
Import/Export buttons in Config Window
Custom icons for your profile
changed: Changed version styling

releases.title: Æ§ no more, uploader and more
added: Kofi Button in about window
You can now further customize where screenshots are stored
EzMode is now in beta, toggle it with '.' in the Editor
Uploading to SnipSniper.net/jars/ with every commit
GIF Support for custom icons
changed: S Icon was mirrored, oops! (How did we never notice this)
Log files are now saved as .log
Better logging, changing format
Changed how tray icon popup menu is positioned

added: Something was added to the about window...
Spyglass feature to Capture window
? (InfoButton) button without text for now
profile create/remove buttons to config window
Language dropdown to config window
Rotate button to Viewer
New fancy popup when right clicking tray icon
Gradient JButton to go along with the new color chooser
changed: Changed how we render things in Capture window
We now use our own color format to save color gradients
Revamped color window
SmartPixel supports gradients
'Open Editor' setting is now always true

releases.title: Versioning update
changed: Using new 'Version' system. - 3 Types of Versions: release, dev and dirty - Tracking that and other settings like build date and build nr
Fixed small bug related to the about page

releases.title: This release has been deleted
added: GitHub action files
changed: Tray icons are only created if we are running on a supported platform

added: Basic linux functionality, bugs are expected!

changed: All stamps are now available in the editor tab in the config window

added: Added a few stamps to the config window
Editor now has a config button at the top
Global Tab in config window, there you can set the language, theme and if debug is enabled
changed: Debug Console can be opened from tasktray if debug is enabled
Changed old config window for a newer fancier one with multiple tabs (coming soon) and a profile dropdown
Using FlatLaf theme now
Switching from Viewer to Editor works again
Viewer closes on right click now
Zoom in Viewer now works without holding the movement button

releases.title: SnipScope update
added: SnipScope: A window system that allows zooming and moving of an image
changed: Using SnipScope for Editor and Viewer

releases.title: Viewer update
added: Viewer (We know, crazy
Text stamp
You can now drop images in editor

releases.title: Standalone Editor update
added: Standalone editor
Windows versions (Installer & Portable)
changed: Changed version styling

added: Smarter encoding, only restarting if needed
New -language argument

Added language support:
	- English
	- German
	- French
	- Italian
	- Japanese
	- Russian
	- Chinese

changed: Translated main interface and config window

added: Made Config class modular, causing renamed configs, language is set in main.cfg
Added command line arguments (Run ```java -jar SnipSniper.jar -help``` to find out more)

changed: Fixed bug with editor window appearing over the screen
You are now able to use mouse buttons for capture hotkeys
Editor Window Color Picker now allows you to save default color for that stamp
Editor Window now only saves if you have atleast made one change once!

added: Paintbrush stamp

changed: Each stamp now saves its own color
HSV Color switcher now starts from the correct origin color

added: Added Undo function to editor (CTRL + Z)

changed: Fixed bug with Smart Pixel when over Counter Stamp
Fixed issue with Tab & Alt key not working properly in the editor window
Renamed old Circle Stamp to counter stamp and added a new circle stamp, which is hollow
Orange tint to trayicons waiting to capture

added: Language system (supporting english and german)
Circle stamp! It has a number in the middle and counts up with every stamp!
changed: Stamps are now modular
HSV color switcher: Fixed bug with color loosing transparency when switching
HSV color switcher: Fixed bug where color could not be switched into different 'direction' by using another mouse wheel direction
Fixed issue with HSV/HSB Color switcher. Thanks jess!
Fixed issue with images not getting saved
Fixed bug with censor mode in editor window
Updated about window
Fixed bug with smart pixel

added: Better rendering into buffer to avoid flickering
Variable "directDraw" to avoid the above, which makes it slightly faster
Censor button (middle mouse) to editor window

changed: Fixed issue when launching multiple screenshots
Solved lag issue when taking screenshot

added: Smart Pixel Feature

changed: Fixed issue with editor window position when main monitor is not on the most left side

releases.title: This update has an error in its versioning styling
changed: Fixed issue regarding loading profiles

added: New fancy color chooser

changed: Using game style loop for rendering
Changed to separate mouse listener

added: SnipSniper Editor

changed: Set icon for taskbar
